DOC.brief_summary: Post-marketing surveillance to investigate the clinical safety and effectiveness in patients of all implantation of Gliadel with malignant glioma in the actual medical setting.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Gliadel 7.7mg Implant (All-case Observational Study)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Allpatient of Gliadel implantation Exclusion criteria:
